\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 71040}

\subsection*{No Go}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Marlboro27s}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 3.5 g & oral & Mushrooms & dried\\
\hline
 T+ 4:00 & 3.0 g & oral & Mushrooms & dried\\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 & 4.0 g & oral & Mushrooms & dried\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 145.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
So it started out when I got a half oz of booms from a buddy of mine, for free. So I thought to myself, hey I'm gunna trip for the next few days, sounds like fun, right? Wrong. Yes I did have a fantastic trip the first day when I took 3.5 grams and then 3.0 grams 4 hours after that. But then I thought that the next day would also be a fun day to trip, I took 4 grams the next day and did not get a single effect, nothing at all, total waste of booms, my pupils didn't even diolate at all. I took some vit. c. still nothing. It was a total waste and I couldn't believe how stupid I was for doing that.

\end{document}
